attributes.action: Stop Parking facing oncoming traffic Now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the USA they already have a law which stops drivers parking facing oncoming traffic, lets stop the need for drivers making dangerous turns in the face of oncoming vehicles.

It is a simple law to enforce by either traffic wardens or police officers by way of fine in the first instance followed by an endorsement for following 
enforcements.
